selectedVerses.text: By the sweat of your face you shall eat bread, till you return to the ground, for out of it you were taken; for you are dust, and to dust you shall return."
They shall have linen turbans on their heads, and linen undergarments around their waists. They shall not bind themselves with anything that causes sweat.
And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly; and his sweat became like great drops of blood falling down to the ground.
